The Flash

IMDB : 8.1/10

Genre : Action, Adventure, Drama

After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, fighting crime in Central City.

Arrow

IMDB : 7.9/10

Genre : Action, Adventure, Crime

Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.

Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood

IMDB : 9.1/10

Genre : Animation, Action, Adventure

Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

The Wire

IMDB : 9.3/10

Genre : Crime, Drama, Thriller

Baltimore drug scene, seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

The Defenders

IMDB : 7.9/10

Genre : Action, Adventure, Crime

Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Iron Fist team up to fight crime in New York City.

Sherlock

IMDB : 9.2/10

Genre : Crime, Drama, Mystery

A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

Planet Earth II

IMDB : 9.6/10

Genre : Documentary

David Attenborough returns in this breathtaking documentary showcasing life on Planet Earth.

Game of Thrones

IMDB : 9.5/10

Genre : Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

Breaking Bad

IMDB : 9.5/10

Genre : Crime, Drama, Thriller

A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

Band of Brothers

IMDB : 9.5/10

Genre : Action, Drama, History

The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division, and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord, through V-J Day.
